transcript: I mean, I'm sending out my resumes and doing everything I can do, but not a happening. You know, it's like I can't and I can't keep living on loans anymore like this. I mean, I eventually have to pay it back. I'm just kind of freaking out. I don't know.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean I've been sending out my resumes and doing everything I can do but nothing is happening.  You know, it's like I can't and I can't keep living on loans anymore like this.  I'm going to--I mean eventually I'm going to have to pay it back. I'm just kind of freaking out, I don't know.
